short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the playback speed for video or audio clips on any website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web browsers have native capability of slowing down or speeding up audio and video content on almost any website. This extension taps into this functionality to let you change the playback rate even on websites that do not make that functionality available through it's standard user interface. This extension is extremely lightweight with a very simple user interface and no fancy bells and whistles - just gets the job done!
